name: site-ci-tools
description: Installing NPM tools for CI tasks, reproduced locally.

scripts.lint-md: SUM=0 && for f in $(find . -name '*.md' -not -path './node_modules/*' 2> /dev/null && find . -name '*.markdown' -not -path './node_modules/*' 2> /dev/null); do echo "Validating $f..." && ./node_modules/.bin/markdownlint "$f" && : || FOO=$? && SUM=$(( SUM + 1 )); done && if [ "$SUM" -gt 0 ]; then echo "There were $SUM errors!" && echo "ERROR: Exited with code 1"; else echo "Success!"; fi
scripts.lint-liquid: TOTAL=0 && for e in "html" "htm" "liquid" "lqd" "markdown" "md"; do SUM=0 && echo "Searching for '*.$e' ..." && for f in $(find . -name "*.$e" -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './_sites/*'); do echo "Validating '$f' ..." && ./node_modules/.bin/liquid-linter "$f" 2> /dev/null && : || FOO=$? && TOTAL=$(( TOTAL + 1)) && SUM=$(( SUM + 1 )); done && if [ "$TOTAL" -gt 0 ]; then echo "There were $TOTAL (or so) errors!" && echo "ERROR: Exited with code 1"; else echo "Success!"; fi; done;
scripts.lint-html: echo "Validating HTML..." && cd docs/ && htmlproofer ./_site --only-4xx --check-favicon --check-html && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"
scripts.lint-css: echo "Validating CSS..." && ./node_modules/.bin/stylelint docs/_site/**/*.css && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"
scripts.lint-js: echo "Validating JS and JSX..." && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --env browser docs/ && echo Success! || echo "ERROR: Exited with code $?"

author: Joseph Hall (@groundh0g)
